content.body: Do we have a list of places to look at to see how host hooks are used, or is the HTML spec the only host with a clearly defined ecma262 integration? I'm curious to see what hosts save in a Module Record's [[HostDefined]] slot.
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Do we have a list of places to look at to see how host hooks are used, or is the HTML spec the only host with a clearly defined ecma262 integration? I'm curious to see what hosts save in a Module Record's [[HostDefined]] slot.
